channel.title: Playing midi files
channel.description:
I was playing around with my axoloti and I was surprised at I can be used as MIDI interface. With a simple MIDI thru object you can have a din IN/OUT for your DAW. So, I connected my microkorg and volca, and I patched a DX7 synth and one drum every instrument at different MIDI channels and I can route midi tracks from Reaper to each instrument separated, all with cc control, and also fx from the axo. Working. Cool feature. Ok, now, I want to take this set without a computer for live instances, having all the machines playing live, so I save the midi file in Reaper, upload it to the Axoloti and play it from the "jt/midi/play" object. Not having the same output. Strange things happen. @lysander, are all messages (ch, cc) suported? (Great job, anyway!) Have someone idea of what's happening?
I make this topic also to discuss this matters.
